resources.string:
Integrate Payment Gateway 
 Inside Manifest File add the android permission 
 Create a new empty activity and add a service tag. 
 Inside the service tag get the PayPal SDK and required classes. 
 Configure the PayPal app in MainActivity
This activity contains the list of songs recently played by the user.
This activity contains the list of artists.
This activity contains the albums of each artists.
This activity contains songs played by the user.
This activity contains the list of playlists created by the user.
This activity contains the procedure that lets user pay through 3rd party applications.
